tool_description: Checks technician availability for specific time periods, considering existing schedules, time off, and working hours constraints.

technician_ids.description: List of technician IDs to check availability

required_duration.description: Required time block duration in hours

buffer_time.description: Buffer time in minutes between assignments

consider_travel.description: Whether to account for travel time in scheduling

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and not in the past
Invalid technician list: One or more technician IDs do not exist
Invalid duration: required_duration must be greater than 0 and less than 24 hours
No availability found: No technicians have sufficient availability in the specified timeframe
usage: Provide technician IDs and time requirements to find available slots. Consider setting buffer_time and enabling consider_travel for realistic scheduling.

available_technicians.description: Technician IDs with availability in the requested timeframe

availability_windows.description: Available time windows for each technician

utilization_rates.description: Current utilization percentage for each available technician

earliest_available.description: Earliest possible assignment time across all technicians
